name: psy/psysh
description: An interactive shell for modern PHP.

suggest.ext-pcntl: Enabling the PCNTL extension makes PsySH a lot happier :)
suggest.ext-posix: If you have PCNTL, you'll want the POSIX extension as well.
suggest.ext-readline: Enables support for arrow-key history navigation, and showing and manipulating command history.
suggest.ext-pdo-sqlite: The doc command requires SQLite to work.
suggest.hoa/console: A pure PHP readline implementation. You'll want this if your PHP install doesn't already support readline or libedit.
